data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Zlatiborski, Serbia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zlatiborski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Zlatiborski, Serbia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Zlatiborski, Serbia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Zlatiborski a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Bosniak people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
God, we pray both the men and women of Zlatiborski, Serbia will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Zlatiborski, Serbia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Zlatiborski you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
